name: forecast_hours
description: Forecast offset, in hours, from the forecast creation_time

name: forecast_time
description: Forecast time. Equal to creation_time + forecast_hours

name: u_component_of_wind_10m_above_ground
description: U component of wind 10m above ground. m/s

name: v_component_of_wind_10m_above_ground
description: V component of wind 10m above ground. m/s

name: total_precipitation_surface
description: Until 2019-11-07 06:00:00, this field represents the precipitation at surface at the forecasted time. After that date, this field holds the cumulative precipitation at surface added together from all forecasts starting from hour 0 (only for assets with forecast_hours > 0). kg/m^2

name: precipitable_water_entire_atmosphere
description: Precipitable water for entire atmosphere. kg/m^2

name: total_cloud_cover_entire_atmosphere
description: Total cloud cover for entire atmosphere (only for assets with forecast_hours > 0). %

name: downward_shortwave_radiation_flux
description: Downward shortwave radiation flux (only for assets with forecast_hours > 0). W/m^2
